column4: ok guys, I couldnt find my nic or any drivers for it, so i plugged into my dsl modem through usb, how do i configure it now?
how do i set up a usb to dsl modem connection?
i think you'll have more luck if you go w/ the ethernet connection if it has one
i doubt it's possible right now, but i could be wrong.. you'd be much better off sticking a NIC in there
